job_overview:
Be our dynamic DIGITAL MARKETING MANAGER! APPLY NOW!

Our company is seeking an experienced digital marketing manager to join our dynamic team. You will oversee all aspects of our digital marketing campaigns, ensuring they effectively reach our target audience.  If you are an ambitious and dedicated professional passionate about driving digital marketing strategies, this is a fantastic opportunity to grow your career in a supportive and innovative environment.

Interested applicants may apply via email at Upgrade to see actual info

Key Responsibilities
*Develop and implement comprehensive digital marketing strategies to promote our company across multiple online platforms.
*Lead digital marketing campaigns from conceptualization through execution, including content creation, optimization, and performance analysis.
*Assist in managing the client’s website, ensuring it is user-friendly, SEO-optimized, and aligned with their branding and marketing goals.
*Monitor and evaluate the effectiveness of digital marketing efforts using performance analytics, adjusting strategies to improve outcomes.
*Collaborate with other department heads to ensure marketing initiatives are aligned with overall business goals.
*Utilize data-driven insights to refine digital marketing strategies, ensuring campaigns are optimized for maximum outreach and engagement.
*Implement automated workflows to enhance audience engagement and streamline marketing processes.
*Pitch new ideas and strategies, using data to iterate and optimize for better results.
*Stay updated with the latest trends in digital marketing, SEO, SEM, and emerging digital platforms.

Qualifications And Skills
>Proven experience in managing successful campaigns
>Strong understanding of SEO, SEM, content marketing, social media marketing, email marketing, and digital analytics
>In-depth understanding of digital marketing tools and platforms, particularly Google Analytics, and proficiency in leveraging data to optimize campaigns
>Excellent leadership and team management skills, with the ability to delegate tasks and mentor junior teaUpgrade to see actual infombers
>Creative and innovative mindset, capable of generating fresh ideas for digital content and campaign strategies
>Strong analytical skills, with the ability to interpret data and make informed decisions to optimize campaigns
>Highly adaptable with excellent problem-solving skills, able to navigate challenges and changes in the digital landscape effectively
>Ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously, prioritizing tasks to meet deadlines effectively
>Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to collaborate effectively across departments

Basic Requirements
Device Specifications: Intel i5 processor or higher with a minimum of 8GB RAM
Equipment: Webcam, speakers, and a microphone or headphones
Internet Speed: Minimum of 100Mbps with a backup connection in case of outages
Work Details
Working Hours: Monday to Friday, 8 AM to 5 PM Pacific Standard Time | Tuesday to Saturday, 12 AM to 8 AM Manila Time
Location: Anywhere in the Philippines

Why Join Us?
Stable employment
Competitive salary
Bi-monthly salary
A-Z benefits, including bonuses and annual raises
Work-life balance 
Work-from-home opportunity
